main event: Mrs. W. F. Tompkins reported seeing a flying saucer near San Angelo on May 6, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being shaped like a saucer., Mrs. Tompkins observed the object around 4:45 p.m., The object appeared stationary for about two minutes before zooming upward., The sighting took place approximately 10 miles north of San Angelo., The report was forwarded to the Air Force by the local newspaper.
witness description: Mrs. W. F. Tompkins, a local resident
